description: Albrecht D端rer illustrates the four horsemen of the apocalypse as described by John in the book of Revelation in the bible. Some Christians interpret the four riders as the harbingers of Judgement Day.

name: Garden of Earthly Delights
author: Hieronymus Bosch
description: Hieronymus Bosch creates a triptych of three separate images. The left image shows the joining of Adam and Eve. The middle shows what appears to be early humans thriving in the Garden of Eden. The right image appears to show a hellish apocalyptic scenario, where humanity suffers.

name: Last Judgement
author: Michelangelo
description: Michelangelo creates a painting displaying his interpretation of Judgment Day. Those that are judged as righteous by God rise to the heavens, while the damned are left to Earth, and have already begun fighting amongst themselves. The damned are left to their own apocalyptic world.
